VM1 - 192.168.3.2
VM2 - 192.168.3.3
VM3 - 192.168.3.4

Commands on VM1 to redirect traffic from 192.168.3.0/24 subnet to NAT interface:
sysctl -w net.ipv4.ip_forward=1
sudo iptables -t nat -A POSTROUTING -o enp0s3 -j MASQUERADE
sudo iptables -I FORWARD -o enp0s3 -s 192.168.3.0/24 -j ACCEPT
sudo iptables -I INPUT -o enp0s3 -s 192.168.3.0/24 -j ACCEPT

Adding default gateway on VM2
ip route add default  via 192.168.3.2 dev enp0s8

Disabling NAT on VM2 and VM3 performed by changing ONBOOT=yes parameter to ONBOOT=no

VM1 host only:
#VAGRANT-BEGIN
# The contents below are automatically generated by Vagrant. Do not modify.
NM_CONTROLLED=yes
BOOTPROTO=none
ONBOOT=yes
IPADDR=192.168.3.2
NETMASK=255.255.255.0
DEVICE=enp0s8
PEERDNS=no
#VAGRANT-END

VM1 NAT:
TYPE=Ethernet
BOOTPROTO=dhcp
DEFROUTE=yes
IPV4_FAILURE_FATAL=no
IPV6INIT=no
IPV6_AUTOCONF=yes
IPV6_DEFROUTE=yes
IPV6_PEERDNS=yes
IPV6_PEERROUTES=yes
IPV6_FAILURE_FATAL=no
NAME=enp0s3
UUID=a29eda29-cd30-4e02-a80d-87938448e791
ONBOOT=yes
HWADDR=08:00:27:59:2B:BC
PEERDNS=yes
PEERROUTES=yes
